openGraph.title: Pomodoro focus timer
openGraph.description: Plan focused work and recovery breaks with a simple Pomodoro timer. Customize durations, track sessions, and stay on rhythm.

title: Pomodoro Focus Timer
description: Balance focus and rest with customizable Pomodoro sessions.
progressHint: Progress resets when the session switches.
tip: Tip: 25/5 is the classic Pomodoro rhythm. Adjust the goal to fit your day.
